title: 75. Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with Nisha Mathew and Soumitra Ghosh
itunes:title: 75. Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with Nisha Mathew and Soumitra Ghosh
description: How do we re-think what is essential? How does the spiritual influence design thinking? How can we understand the poetics of transgression in the design world? This week we continue our ongoing miniseries Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with architects and Nisha Mathew and Soumitra Ghosh.
content:encoded: How do we re-think what is essential? How does the spiritual influence design thinking? How can we understand the poetics of transgression in the design world? This week we continue our ongoing miniseries Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with architects and Nisha Mathew and Soumitra Ghosh.
